info: Version 8.25.0 brings full Cosmos (ATOM) blockchain integration and expands the CLORE ecosystem with ETH token support.
bugs: Kaspa Transaction Handling: Improved UTXO management and transaction processing with minimum transfer threshold set to 0.3 KAS for change outputs.
Kaspa Fee Calculation: Enhanced fee calculation and change handling for more efficient transactions.
Kaspa UTXO Selection: Optimized UTXO selection algorithm for better transaction efficiency.
Various UI/UX improvements and stability fixes
Performance optimizations and general bug fixes
features: Cardano Native Token Support: Full support for Cardano native tokens including SNEK (Snek), MIN (Minswap), and WMT (World Mobile Token) with manual token import functionality.
Cardano WalletConnect Integration: Complete WalletConnect support enabling seamless connection to Cardano dApps, transaction signing through WalletConnect, and support for CIP-30 wallet standard.
